It's old but it's still great, if you haven't played yet, why not!
Improve your map knowedge and aim offline with bots from easy to expert, then go online and play with and against people.
There's not a thousand and one money sucking DLC's like some games but if you want to skin your players and change the look of the weapons there's more than enough free stuff on the web.
This is without doubt my favorite FPS of all time, easy to control and hours of fun, best value for money game you'll ever find.

Overall, amazing game. I started playing roughly 6 years ago when i was 11 years old, have been playing it ever since. There are so many varities of things ranging from plain team vs team, to zombie escapes, Jailbreak, surfing, to countless other things. I would highly recommend this game.

Chef Robert loves this game and you will too!

Hello guys,

This is my review of Counter Strike:Source

I've been in love with the Counter Strike series since 1.6, i know the game for a long time and had to get it because its totally worth to get it and play it again.

There are few pros but also cons in Source:

Pros:
Old sounds (Sound better)
Your own sprays for free
128 Tick
Alot of fun modes like Surf, Jailbreak and bhop
Bhopping is alot easier because of the 128 tick servers also goes for surfing
Still alot of people are playing CSS
Knock stuff like barrels or pallets around the map
Better hitboxes (*Cough* CS GO *Cough*)
Harder Bots
And of course the old weapons like the MP5 (God i missed this gun)

Now after the pros we go to the cons, which are:

cons:
Almost every server forbids to buy the AWP which is kinda sad
Servers allow mostly AWP if you buy premium on that server
Buying premium on that server can give you special things like: more HP/Abilities like vampirism and stuff (Talking about unfair play)

I totally love CSS but i really think there should be servers with no premium stuff or anything at all.
Not only that but servers allow alot of people to join on them and play 20 vs 20 or more which is cool, but you really need to get used to it if you are a CS GO player.

20$ for this game is kinda alot but i would buy this game because its fun if you really love the Counter Strike series.
I got the game myself from the sale for 6$ with a bundle with CS CZ and CS 1.6.

Well hopefully i could give you a good review of the game that i really love to play.

I got nothing more to say about it so have fun and have a awsome day.
